attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As eny fule kno politics is fule of weedy wet clots wot canot run a country eny more than blow a buble gum buble but they hav POWER chiz chiz so join moi in effort to hav a da when NONE of them will be alowed to sa a single word on TV wireless or in print no mor mone drone lie lie one da of peece hapiness hullo sky hullo clouds YOU can help mak it hapen hem-hem a politics free da.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
